Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 25 for SLE 15)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 25 for SLE 15)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.12.14-150_75 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2022-1734: Fixed a r/w use-after-free when non synchronized between cleanup routine and firmware download routine. (bnc#1199605)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Live Patching 15

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw in Linux Kernel found in nfcmrvl_nci_unregister_dev() in drivers/nfc/nfcmrvl/main.c can lead to use after free both read or write when non synchronized between cleanup routine and firmware download routine.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Live Patching 15:kernel-livepatch-4_12_14-150_75-default-15-150000.2.2
